code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{userPhone}from"../../pages/reducers/userInfo";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConfirmButton=_ref=>{let{code,inputCode,isCode,cell,check,setStep}=_ref;const movePage=useNavigate();const dispatch=useDispatch();const onClickHandler=e=>{if(check){if(code!==inputCode||inputCode===''){alert('잘못된 인증번호 입니다.');}else{/*movePage('/register');*/setStep('step3');dispatch(userPhone(cell));}}else{alert("필수 확인사항, 약관에 동의해주세요.");}};useEffect(()=>{},[inputCode]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:isCode?'button_on':'button_off',onClick:onClickHandler,disabled:!isCode,children:"\uD655\uC778"})});};export default ConfirmButton;
